title: State police investigating accidental shooting of a child
content:
GRAVES COUNTY, KY -
Kentucky State Police say a 3-year-old child was injured in an accidental shooting Thursday in Graves County.
KSP Post 1 says it's investigating an accidental shooting on Kentucky 408 East near Viola in Graves County. Troopers say a 3-year-old child was taken to Baptist Health Paducah with an injury that is not life threatening. Troopers and detectives are on scene, and the investigation is ongoing.
KSP is being assisted on scene by the Graves County Sheriff’s Office and Mayfield Graves County EMS.
